page.title: 10BUILDINGS AT HADHAM HALL
page.content: People have lived on this site for almost 2,000 years. Some buildings and foundations remain from early times. They have been altered and have changed use. Here is a list: *Great Tudor barn now school assembly hall. *15th century gatehouse barn now junior metalworkshop. *Tudor Mansion - school office staffroom and boarding department. *1902 Coach house - Domestic science block. *Site of Celtic huts - Swimming pool. *Stewards cottage - museum. *Site of Tudor long gallery - canteen. *1902 Mansion extension-Boarding Dept. *Site of Tudor garden - Hockey pitch. *South wing of Tudor mansion - headmasters flat. *1668 kitchen garden - headmasters garden.
